lines.text: You have the right to remain silent...
lines.character: Deputy Sheriff Thomas Jefferson Geronimo III
Deputy Sheriff Thomas Jefferson Geronimo III

lines.text: Think you can take me? Well, go ahead on. It's your move.
lines.character: Deputy Sheriff Thomas Jefferson Geronimo III

lines.text: The big one's got my badge. Will you get it for me?
lines.character: Deputy Sheriff Thomas Jefferson Geronimo III
